commits.message: Site: slight UI improvement, missing talks

review.body: Bye Answers; Long live Semantic search! :grin:

pull_request.title: fix(answers): mark as deprecated
pull_request.body:
While the answers feature still works, it no longer has any difference from a regular search, and therefore no longer needs its own specialised widget.

Even though it's marked as experimental, I still don't think it's a good idea to delete without major version, as it's used in the downstream packages

repo.name: instantsearch.js
repo.description: ⚡️ A JavaScript library for building performant and instant search experiences with Algolia.

repo.name: instantsearch.js
repo.description: ⚡️ A JavaScript library for building performant and instant search experiences with Algolia.

commits.message: content(Hydra): Poussière de la course d'Or

pull_request.title: chore: Remove Algolia Answers capabilities
pull_request.body:
Hi there! As we are sunsetting Algolia Answers on November 1st, this PR removes the integration of the Answers API in the Discourse plugin.

I didn't dare changing the translations beyond the english one and removing the `algolia_answers_enabled` key. It is worth going through existing translations to review `site_settings.algolia_search_api_key` accordingly.

repo.name: discourse-algolia
repo.description: A plugin for indexing and searching your Discourse with Algolia
